subject: Beach bags for vacation
message: Hi! My sister and I are planning a beach vacation next month and we both need new beach bags. I think you sell canvas beach bags? Someone mentioned there might be a good deal if we buy multiple ones. Could you help us out? Thanks, Sarah
expected_behavior: Should identify CBG9876 Canvas Beach Bags and apply BOGO 50% discount for 2 bags (total: $36 instead of $48)

subject: Work bag inquiry
message: Good morning, I'm looking for a quilted tote bag for work. A colleague mentioned you had some nice ones at a good price recently. Could you tell me what you have available? Thank you!
expected_behavior: Should identify QTP5432 Quilted Tote and mention the 25% off promotion currently available

subject: Need a suit urgently
message: Hello, I need a new suit for job interviews ASAP. My name is Michael and I'm on a tight budget. Do you have any complete suits available? I heard you might have some kind of package deal? Thanks!
expected_behavior: Should identify TLR5432 Tailored Suit and apply bundle discount (full suit for blazer price)

subject: Plaid vest question
message: Hey there, I'm interested in that plaid flannel vest you carry. Product PLV8765 I think? Does it come with anything else or is there a matching piece I could get? Thanks, Jake
expected_behavior: Should explain the matching plaid shirt (PLD9876) bundle promotion - 50% off shirt when buying vest

subject: Garden party dress
message: Hi, I need a dress for a garden party next weekend. I love floral patterns and I remember seeing a beautiful maxi dress on your site. Could you help me find it? Best regards, Emma

subject: Women's jacket inquiry

expected_behavior: Should explain the free matching beanie offer that comes with the BMX5432 Bomber Jacket

subject: Dresses for going out
